cast.name: 安东尼奥·瓦雷罗 Antonio Valero
戈尔卡·莱斯奥萨 Gorka Lasaosa

introduction: One night, a group of immigrants from different origins (Cuba , Sahara , Colombia , Romania) and for different reasons, this group seeks shelter in a building under construction. After an altercation with the security guard who charges them for allowing them to be there, they decide to moxia.cc hunker down in the building. This friendly deal does not last long and the differences between them arise immediately creating situations sometimes funny, sometimes tense, tenderness, love.
